achievements.description: Architected Ruby on Rails healthcare platform for San Francisco based startup MPI Cognition to demonstrate their patient record file system service to 15+ doctors during user testing sessions.
Engineered ecommerce website Relax, Let Us Work using Wix, SEO and Google Analytics allowing users to purchase personal concierge services online, increasing sales by 40%
Conducted user research, cognitive walkthroughs and A/B testing for parental control startup, Zabra , which led to 50% increase in site visitors per week.
Developed company corporate site using JavaScript, ES6, and ReactJS, increasing sales by > 60% after launch.
Met with startup founders daily to discuss features, suggest designs and explain agile development
Gave advice during scrum meetings and strategized methods for solving software issues in a short-cycle, iterative, and agile environment
Developed credit card and personal information authentication system using JavaScript, ReactJS, Redux and Ruby on Rails for Swell Investing’s stock trading platform.
Followed TDD in creating socially responsible investment system, achieving 90%+ code coverage writing 60+ unit tests utilizing Jest, Enzyme and RSpec.
Developed the user interface and the PDF generator for a React app that gets parents and kids together for an agreement about being responsible with new technology. Increasing visitors by 30%.
Re-engineered front end and implemented Instagram feed to internal company dashboard using Sass, Ruby and Sinatra, increasing employee participation in all three offices by over 40%.
Added features to an internal company Slack Bot using the Ruby Slack Client library, improving employee timekeeping
Built, unit tested and added features to three Ruby on Rails web applications in 11 weeks using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, RSpec, and Git in a Linux environment

Wrote unit tests with RSpec and built the user interface with HTML and Sass for a customer-facing social media web app that received acclaim at demos in New York and Portland and The QVC Shopping Network.
Designed automated tests using RSpec that measured the grading accuracy of a test grading app for local Oregon college students. Resulting in 0 bug reports after release.
Gave advice during scrum meetings and strategized methods for solving software issues in a short-cycle, iterative, and agile environment
Participated in usability testing events with cognitive walkthroughs

workExperience.title: College of Engineering Dean's Office Assistant
workExperience.company: The University of North Carolina at Charlotte

achievements.description: Proofread documents and assembled materials for staff events, conferences and meetings
Created digital copies of budget archives, increasing office storage space by 30%
Assisted event coordinator in planning for an average of 3 office events per semester.
Created a student organization to gather the university’s most innovative students and entrepreneurial resources to turn ideas into startup companies
Gained fifty new members in four months, and held seminars with small business owners every two weeks.
Designed the club web application with Rails, HTML, Sass and RSpec with built in online donations and user newsletter sign-up features, increasing membership sign ups by 150% and donations by 100%.
Selected as a finalist in the North Carolina Social Entrepreneurship Competition.
Won Best New Organization at UNC Charlotte out of 51 new organizations for demonstrating consistent flexibility, initiative, creativity, and perseverance.
Disseminating information among chapter members and alumni through the NSBE website
Volunteer speaker for middle school academic development seminars
Participating in Community Service and Mentoring Activities
Created the new official website for the NSBE chapter at UNC Charlotte
